com.hcl.domino.html

Interface RichTextHTMLConverter


  • public interface RichTextHTMLConverter
    Utility class to convert between rich text and HTML

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  RichTextHTMLConverter.Builder 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void readEmbeddedImage(Document doc, String itemName, Collection<String> options, int itemIndex, int itemOffset, EmbeddedImage.HTMLImageReader callback)
      Method to access images embedded in HTML conversion result.
      RichTextHTMLConverter.Builder render(Database database)
      Renders a database as HTML, which displays its web landing page.
      RichTextHTMLConverter.Builder render(Document doc)
      Renders a document as HTML (including its form) and gives access to embedded images.
      RichTextHTMLConverter.Builder renderItem(Document doc, String itemName)
      Renders a rich text item as HTML and gives access to embedded images

    • Method Detail

      • renderItem

        RichTextHTMLConverter.Builder renderItem(Document doc,
                                         String itemName)
        Renders a rich text item as HTML and gives access to embedded images
        Parameters:
        doc - the document containing the item to convert
        itemName - the name of the item to convert
        Returns:
        conversion result

      • render

        RichTextHTMLConverter.Builder render(Document doc)
        Renders a document as HTML (including its form) and gives access to embedded images.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document or design note to convert
        Returns:
        conversion result

      • render

        RichTextHTMLConverter.Builder render(Database database)
        Renders a database as HTML, which displays its web landing page.
        Parameters:
        database - the database to convert
        Returns:
        conversion result

      • readEmbeddedImage

        void readEmbeddedImage(Document doc,
                       String itemName,
                       Collection<String> options,
                       int itemIndex,
                       int itemOffset,
                       EmbeddedImage.HTMLImageReader callback)
        Method to access images embedded in HTML conversion result. Compute index and offset parameters from the img tag path like this: 1.3E => index=1, offset=63
        Parameters:
        doc - document
        itemName - rich text field which is being converted
        options - conversion options in "key=value" format
        itemIndex - the relative item index -- if there is more than one, Item with the same pszItemName, then this indicates which one (zero relative)
        itemOffset - byte offset in the Item where the element starts
        callback - callback to receive the data
